name: Data for Texas Coastal Nutrient Input Repository

creator.affiliation: Texas Water Resources Institute, Texas A&M AgriLife Research
creator.name: Michael Schramm

description: Nitrate and Total Phosphorus loading data for phase 1 of the project (Lavaca Bay)
funder: NOAA and Texas General Land Office

variableMeasured.name: year
variableMeasured.description: Year in 4-digit format

variableMeasured.name: site_no
variableMeasured.description: Unique site identfier

variableMeasured.name: NO3_Estimate
variableMeasured.description: Aggregated annual nitrate load

variableMeasured.name: NO3_Upper
variableMeasured.description: Upper 95% credible interval of aggregated annual nitrate load

variableMeasured.name: NO3_Lower
variableMeasured.description: Lower 95% credible interval of aggregated annual nitrate load

variableMeasured.name: NO3_Estimate
variableMeasured.description: Flow-normalized aggregated annual nitrate load

variableMeasured.name: NO3_Upper
variableMeasured.description: Flow-normalized upper 95% credible interval of aggregated annual nitrate load

variableMeasured.name: NO3_Lower
variableMeasured.description: Flow-normalized lower 95% credible interval of aggregated annual nitrate load

variableMeasured.name: TP_Estimate
variableMeasured.description: Aggregated annual total phosporus load

variableMeasured.name: TP_Upper
variableMeasured.description: Upper 95% credible interval of aggregated annual total phosphorus load

variableMeasured.name: TP_Lower
variableMeasured.description: Lower 95% credible interval of aggregated annual total phosporus load

variableMeasured.name: TP_Estimate
variableMeasured.description: Flow-normalized aggregated annual total phosphorus load

variableMeasured.name: TP_Lower
variableMeasured.description: Flow-normalized lower 95% credible interval of aggregated annual total phosphorus load

variableMeasured.name: Date
variableMeasured.description: Date in yyyy-mm-dd format

variableMeasured.name: Flow
variableMeasured.description: Measured mean daily streamflow

variableMeasured.name: log1p_Flow
variableMeasured.description: Log of mean daily streamflow plus 1
